mapper.select: SELECT c.ifcmSeq ,c.ifcmComment ,c.ifcmCreatedAt ,c.ifcmModifiedAt ,c.ifcmDelNy ,c.ifmmSeq ,c.ifcmGrade ,s.ifstName ,s.ifstAddress FROM review c JOIN store s on s.ifstSeq = c.ifstSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY c.ifcmSeq DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review c WHERE 1=1

SELECT c.ifcmSeq ,c.ifcmComment ,c.ifcmGrade ,s.ifstName ,s.ifstAddress ,m.ifmmName from comment c LEFT JOIN store s on s.ifstSeq = c.ifstSeq LEFT JOIN member m on m.ifmmSeq = c.ifmmSeq where 1=1 AND c.ifcmSeq = #{ifcmSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET ifcmDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 and c.ifcmDelNy = #{ifcmDelNy}
